com.hush.util
Interface LoggerDelegate

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommonsLoggerDelegate
public interface LoggerDelegate

Provided to allow for overriding the simple System.err logging in Logger. There is a reason this is a separate interface!!!!!!! Self-referencing classes are bad in webapps, they cause memory leaks. -sbs
